songLyrics.jpnStr: 今[いま]は硝子[がらす]の蓋[ふた]を閉[し]めて
songLyrics.engStr: Now I'll close the glass lid

songLyrics.jpnStr: この気持[きも]ちが私[わたし]の胸[むね]を衝[つ]いて
songLyrics.engStr: This emotion that struck me in the chest

songLyrics.jpnStr: いつか目[め]の前[まえ]の君[きみ]に届[とど]くまで
songLyrics.engStr: Until it reaches you someday who is right in front of me

songLyrics.jpnStr: あとどれくらいの時間[じかん]をかけて
songLyrics.engStr: How much longer will it take

songLyrics.jpnStr: どんな道[みち]を通[とお]るだろう
songLyrics.engStr: And what path will it take

songLyrics.jpnStr: 君[きみ]の恋[こい]を邪魔[じゃま]しないように
songLyrics.engStr: I hope it doesn't get in the way of your love

songLyrics.jpnStr: どうか綺麗[きれい]なままで育[そだ]ってね
songLyrics.engStr: So I hope it will grow beautifully

songLyrics.jpnStr: なんてたぶん無理[むり]だけどね
songLyrics.engStr: Although I know it is probably impossible

songLyrics.jpnStr: 交差点[こうさてん]で君[きみ]を見付[みつ]けた時[とき]に
songLyrics.engStr: When I saw you at the intersection

songLyrics.jpnStr: 目[め]が合[あ]った瞬間[しゅんかん]で時間[じかん]が止[と]まる
songLyrics.engStr: Time stopped the instant our eyes met

songLyrics.jpnStr: 信号[しんごう]は青[あお]に変[か]わり 誰[だれ]かの笑[わら]う声[こえ]がした
songLyrics.engStr: The traffic light turns green and I hear someone laughing

songLyrics.jpnStr: まだ私[わたし]は動[うご]けないでいる
songLyrics.engStr: I still can't move

songLyrics.jpnStr: これ以上[いじょう] 心[こころ]に君[きみ]が溢[あふ]れてしまえば
songLyrics.engStr: If you continue to fill up my heart

songLyrics.jpnStr: 息[いき]が出来[でき]なくなってしまう
songLyrics.engStr: I will not be able to breathe

songLyrics.jpnStr: 今[いま]は硝子[がらす]の蓋[ふた]を閉[し]めて
songLyrics.engStr: Now I'll close the glass lid

songLyrics.jpnStr: もしも君[きみ]が今[いま]と違[ちが]う顔[かお]で
songLyrics.engStr: If you had a different face

songLyrics.jpnStr: もっと違[ちが]った声[こえ]をしていたら
songLyrics.engStr: And if you had a completely different voice

songLyrics.jpnStr: こんなに苦[くる]しい思[おも]いをせずに
songLyrics.engStr: Without feeling this much pain right now

songLyrics.jpnStr: 今日[きょう]を過[す]ごしていたのかな
songLyrics.engStr: Will I be able to get through today

songLyrics.jpnStr: たぶん違[ちが]う出会[であ]い方[かた]でも
songLyrics.engStr: Even if we had met under different circumstances

songLyrics.jpnStr: 同[おな]じように君[きみ]を好[す]きになったよ
songLyrics.engStr: I would probably still fall in love with you

songLyrics.jpnStr: だってそういうものだからね
songLyrics.engStr: I mean, that's just how love works

songLyrics.jpnStr: 私[わたし]が私[わたし]じゃ無[な]くなるくらい
songLyrics.engStr: I feel as if I've lost my own self

songLyrics.jpnStr: 君[きみ]の姿[すがた] 仕草[しぐさ]を 焼[や]き付[つ]けている
songLyrics.engStr: As your appearance and geatures, are burnt into my memory

songLyrics.jpnStr: いつも視線[しせん]を辿[たど]って
songLyrics.engStr: I always trace your gaze

songLyrics.jpnStr: 言葉[ことば]はどれも痛[いた]くて
songLyrics.engStr: And all your words hurt me

songLyrics.jpnStr: 気付[きづ]かれないようにあの子[こ]を恨[うら]んで
songLyrics.engStr: I act as if I've never noticed anything and hated that person

songLyrics.jpnStr: 少[すこし]くらいズルくても手[て]に入[はい]るなら
songLyrics.engStr: Maybe I could have you if I were a little more sly

songLyrics.jpnStr: そんな汚[きたな]い私[わたし]がこぼれ出[だ]さないように
songLyrics.engStr: But I try to stop that dark side of myself showing

songLyrics.jpnStr: 今[いま]は硝子[がらす]の蓋[ふた]を閉[し]めて
songLyrics.engStr: So now I will close the glass lid

songLyrics.jpnStr: 私[わたし]の中なかで今[いま]も渦巻[うずま]く
songLyrics.engStr: This emotion swirling inside me

songLyrics.jpnStr: この気持[きも]ちを目[め]で見[み]える形[かたち]に
songLyrics.engStr: If they were to turn into a visible shape

songLyrics.jpnStr: 変[か]えてしまったなら
songLyrics.engStr: And if you changed them

songLyrics.jpnStr: 小[ちい]さな身体[からだ]を突[つ]き破[やぶ]って
songLyrics.engStr: It would pierce through my small body

songLyrics.jpnStr: 空[そら]を覆[おお]い君[きみ]を隠[かく]すでしょう
songLyrics.engStr: And envelope the skies to hide you away

songLyrics.jpnStr: 交差点[こうさてん]で君[きみ]を見付[みつ]けた時[とき]に
songLyrics.engStr: When I saw you at the intersection

songLyrics.jpnStr: 目[め]が合[あ]った瞬間[しゅんかん]で時間[じかん]が止[と]まる
songLyrics.engStr: Time stopped the instant our eyes met

songLyrics.jpnStr: 信号[しんごう]は青[あお]に変[か]わり 誰[だれ]かの笑[わら]う声[こえ]がした
songLyrics.engStr: The traffic light turns green and I hear someone laughing

songLyrics.jpnStr: まだ私[わたし]は動[うご]けないでいる
songLyrics.engStr: I still can't move

songLyrics.jpnStr: これ以上[いじょう] 心[こころ]に君[きみ]が溢[あふ]れて
songLyrics.engStr: I don't want you to fill my heart any longer

songLyrics.jpnStr: 誰[だれ]かを傷付[きずつ]けてしまわないように
songLyrics.engStr: I don't want to hurt anyone else

songLyrics.jpnStr: 君[きみ]の恋[こい]の終[お]わりを願[ねが]う本当[ほんとう]の私[わたし]に
songLyrics.engStr: To the real me who prays for the end of your love

songLyrics.jpnStr: 今[いま]は硝子[がらす]の蓋[ふた]を閉[し]めて
songLyrics.engStr: Now I will close the glass lid
